class.name: DTLSServer
class.brief_description: Helper class to implement a DTLS server.

method.name: setup
method.description: Setup the DTLS server to use the given [param server_options]. See [method TLSOptions.server].

method.name: take_connection
method.description: Try to initiate the DTLS handshake with the given [param udp_peer] which must be already connected (see [method PacketPeerUDP.connect_to_host]). [b]Note:[/b] You must check that the state of the return PacketPeerUDP is [constant PacketPeerDTLS.STATUS_HANDSHAKING], as it is normal that 50% of the new connections will be invalid due to cookie exchange.
